title: Support LFT ranked 5's to climb
body:
I am really wanting to play ranked with an entire team, I have experience working with teams and pre-mades over voice chat and have good communication skills (so i have been told) My current rank is S4 after placements but haven't really touched ranked since, peaked S1 last season. 
I am an adaptable player that can play most support champions with confidence, but am willing to learn anything for team comps/playstyles.
I usually filling, so I have a decent grasp on how each lane works and the basic match-ups included.

Best champs are probably: Brad, Trash and Brum

The hours I can play sometimes vary, but I work nights usually from 7PM (mon, wed, fri) but can get called in other nights. I can play most preferably from 12PM to 5PM any day or alternatively after work in the early hours of the morning. So if that matches your teams schedule it'd be perfect :)

Feel free to add me in game and we can chat about schedules and whatever else
